# Astro Vitae
> Professional CV/Resume Template built with Astro and Tailwind CSS

## About
Astro Vitae is an open-source, single-page CV template. Edit one file (src/data/cv-data.ts) to customize all content. Features dark mode, bilingual support, print optimization, and perfect Lighthouse scores.

## Tech Stack
- Astro
- Tailwind CSS
- TypeScript

## Source
https://github.com/GiorgoLazaridis/astro-vitae
